name: Devil Diver
description:
Devil diver is a aquatic hunting treasure game with a constructing element similar to "Jetpac" (Ultimate, 1983). Its gameplay is very similar to "Glug Glug" (CRL Group PLC, 1984) following inclusive the tradition of the "Scuba Dive" (Durell Software Ltd., 1983) genre of discovering treasury. The player commands a diver who is wearing a modern diving suit, allowing him to move freely in opposition to Glug Glug's early diving suit which is restricted by a limited range of movements caused by the dependency of the breathing cable. Concerning Devil Diver's case, the player only has to worry about his oxygen supply.

The main goal of each level alternates between constructing a continuous pipeline and the hunting treasure. Every time a piece of the pipeline is either bad or properly embedded, a treasure has to be taken and collected when taken aboard. Every time a treasure is taken aboard, the player can comfortably rest on the ship secured from the aquatic dangers. This process goes until the submerged pipeline is completed and the last treasure is taken aboard. Only then the next section of the pipeline will be available.

While submerging the player is armoured with a fishing spear-gun provided with limited ammunition and equipped with a jar of oxygen. Every time the player goes aboard, both supplies are restored.

shot.caption: Controls by definition.
Main title screen.
That's where you start buddy.
Delivering a piece of the pipeline.
The next step will be taking that juicy treasure aboard.
Heavy isn't it?
The pipeline is complete, the last treasure stands on one of the most dangerous spots... next to the... "THE HORRIBLE ANEMONE" (June 27th next to you)
I dunno what this pipeline is meant for, but each time you complete a stage you have to built another one.
Transaction of a level.
Level 2 + the jellyfishes.
Level 2 - The shoal is indestructible
Level 2 - Taking a nap aboard.
Level 3 - A Great White Shark (this one takes 2 shots to be killed), a seahorse, a shoal, cousin sponge, uncle jelly and nephew seaweed.
Level 4 - more Seahorses and a giant eel... the others aren't forgotten of course. It's very repetitive to describe them all ya know?
Level 4 - Delivering the last piece of the pipeline, walking on the sea floor (Here it is, with peperoni and extra tomato).
Level 5 - The giant Crab is indestructible and is constantly following you. A shrimp passes by asking what this pipe fuss is all about.
Level 5 - Shooting the Shark and relieving oxygen... (carbon dioxide meathead)
Level 5 - Shark was shot. More 5 to go to kill it. A giant oyster awaits you.
Level 6 - Is it a Mesonychoteuthis hamiltoni or a Architeuthis dux? Call 123 NOW!!! 1 for colossal 2 for giant!
Level 6 - Shot the squid - many Calamares for the whole season.
Level 6 - Dragon fish for the menu.
Level 7 - that's an USO
Level 7 - that's a... A giant squid cut in two plus a shoal of USOs... (colossal, meatheeead!)... and what's that shinny object over there?
Level 8 - ...It's... The Ring... I... I can't believe it!
Level 12 - Mine, mine, mne...
Entering the Hall of Heroes.
Hall of Fame.
